mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.login_name AS "loginName", a.password AS "password", a.name AS "name", a.email AS "email", a.phone AS "phone", a.type AS "type", a.sex AS "sex", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.is_del AS "del"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_user a
a.is_del = ${DEL_NORMAL}
AND (a.login_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR a.name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR a.email like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR a.phone like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))

SELECT
FROM sys_user a WHERE a.is_del = #{DEL_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.id

SELECT , r.id AS "roleId", r.enname AS "enname" FROM sys_user a LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON a.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE a.is_del = '0' AND a.login_name = #{loginName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user ( id, login_name, password, name, sex, email, phone, type, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, is_del ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{loginName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{type}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{del} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET is_del = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
